alert.note: Alert for Kandiyohi; Stearns (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 10:37PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN STEARNS AND NORTHEASTERN KANDIYOHI COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 PM CDT... At 1037 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Paynesville, or 18 miles northeast of Willmar, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Cold Spring, Paynesville, Richmond, Lake Henry, Roscoe, Regal, Paynesville Airport, Hawick, and St. Martin. This includes U.S. Highway 8 in Minnesota near mile marker 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in the Twin Cities.
